title: Space company Momentus, once valued at more than $1 billion, is running dangerously low on money
summary: Space company Momentus warned shareholders in a securities filing on Friday that the company is running out of money and does not have a financial lifeline.

title: NASA: No evidence Elon Musk’s SpaceX is not complying with drug and alcohol-free regulations
summary: The National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) has issued a comment about The Wall Street Journal‘s claims that CEO Elon Musk uses drugs...

title: Italian Space Logistics Company D-Orbit Closes €100M Funding Round
summary:
Following a successful 2023 that saw it launch six missions, Italian space logistics company D-Orbit has announced that it has closed a €100 million Series C funding round. D-Orbit offers in-space transportation and hosting services aboard its ION space tugs. The flights are generally launched aboard Falcon 9 Transporter missions and include a mix of […]
The post Italian Space Logistics Company D-Orbit Closes €100M Funding Round appeared first on European Spaceflight.

title: Spanish startup Sateliot seeks funds for 64 more connectivity satellites
summary: Sateliot is seeking 30 million euros ($33 million) from investors to add 64 nanosatellites to a constellation for connecting devices outside of terrestrial networks, the Spanish startup’s founder said as SpaceX prepares to launch its first four commercial satellites this year.
